title: How to Record an Event on a Dish Hopper

steps.title: Turn on your Dish Hopper.
steps.content: Turn on your Dish Hopper. The power button is different on different remotes.

steps.title: Open the Menu.
steps.content: Open the Menu. Now you will see a lot of different things.

steps.title: Open the Guide.
steps.content: Open the Guide. You will now see all the TV schedules.

steps.title: Click on the event you want to record.
steps.content: Click on the event you want to record.

steps.title: After you click on the event you want to record, a small screen will show up.
steps.content: After you click on the event you want to record, a small screen will show up. You will see 5 choices. Press on "Record This".

steps.title: Now you will see a Loading screen.
steps.content: Now you will see a Loading screen. Wait for the receiver to set the timer. There will be a small picture of a clock on the event. That means the event has been recorded.
